tweet: @PeterMcCormack "Bitcoin is the only applicable use for a blockchain"  but this is absurd, Peter.  Just one example, Monero and ZCash... different chains, irrefutably more private than Bitcoin.  Private currency is not an "applicable use" for blockchains?

To improve levels of privacy, the Monero (XMR) protocol will be upgraded on 30/11/19.  Bitfinex users are required to regenerate their deposit addresses on the platform from today.  Find more details on  https://t.co/s22qn84i4g  https://t.co/NrfQ9fF2IV
